comment: "If I multiply this mess times this mess…" 45:50 LOL.  Dr. Strang is so humorous, besides being an excellent professor!
Maybe, in the frequency domain of Discrete Time fourier transform, the period is 2pi, While in the frequency domain for DTF, the period is N. Maybe, any suggestion?
one thing i cant understand (not only one,actually) - how coefficient N converges to 2pi when we aproximate to continious case?
